content: Well, how about that. Never again will our government be able to ask ANY succeeding president for their tax returns. Get ready Trump — we can all play the game that you have changed all the rules for, and will be doing so LONG after you are nothing more than a sad footnote in our history. What a despicable POSPOTUS, as well as every politician who is covering for you and your corruption. If there is none, it’s easy: PROVE IT. Otherwise you have lost ALL credibility to the MAJORITY of Americans!!
